m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      News:Conspiracy From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search News items posted here regarding Conspiracy. Index commenced Oct. 4, 2010 2016 EMP for Deactivating Implanted Chips? – She said her body is riddled with electronic chips of varying sizes. She was hoping I might know of way to deactivate them. I suggested being present during one of the military’s tests of their localized EMP weapons – if they’ll let her. (Free Energy Blog; February 11, 2016) Featured: Batteries / Conspiracy /
